predict_diagnosis:
1. Multiple system atrophy (MSA)
2. Parkinson's disease
3. Huntington's disease
4. Calcaremia (calcification of the brain)
5. Hypocalcemia (low calcium levels)
6. Hypercalcemia (high calcium levels)
7. Hypogonadism (low testosterone)
8. Diabetes mellitus (diabetes)
9. Hypertension (high blood pressure)
10. Benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH)
